title: Savoury green bean, bacon and potato salad
ingredients: ['1kg (2 lb) potatoes, boiled and cubed', '225g (8 oz) green beans, blanched and cut into 5cm (2 in) pieces', '1 red onion, very finely sliced', '175g (6 oz) streaky bacon, cooked and chopped', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper', 'Dressing', '2 tablespoons white wine vinegar', '1 1/2 tablespoons wholegrain mustard', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper', '4 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil']
